name: subordinates
normalized: thank you very much.
the perverted scientists, hans, ingeborg, olov, and magnus, were all seemingly relieved with the results of the brainwashing and remodelling process, which was now on the verge of completion.
however, i noticed a slight flash of anxiety go over their faces.

name: bohgan
normalized: gentlemen, what is the matter?
i asked my colleagues the reason for their anxiety, after having sensed it.
hans opened his mouth of behalf of the entire staff.

name: hans
normalized: even now the navigation-system is still under lockdown, captain.
i couldn’t lift it.

name: hans
normalized: in case we are attacked tomorrow, all our efforts will amount to nothing.
even though the brainwashing degree is at 90% presently, what is incomplete is incomplete nonetheless.

name: bohgan
normalized: are you implying that i am not prepared for it?
hans didn’t respond to that.

name: hans
normalized: let me report the results from our investigation in the infirmary of the communication records, captain.

name: bohgan
normalized: very well.

name: hans
normalized: captain, as you guessed rightly, the empress and the grim reaper ordered a raid by relaying assault-points on our planned route from the infirmary.

name: hans
normalized: it will occur at 15:00 exactly, right before their brainwashing process is to be completed.

name: bohgan
normalized: well, well…
the goddess of destiny was, undoubtedly, a woman who despised me thoroughly.

name: hans
normalized: we can’t alter our plan at this stage.
however, we could get them to unlock the navigation-system, by using the dream-memory infiltration device.

name: hans
normalized: i suggest we kill these pigs, after we alter our route.

name: bohgan
normalized: the dream-memory infiltration device, huh?
you know what it means to use it on them again, don’t you?

name: hans
normalized: the probability of them becoming invalid will rise up to 50%, as it will be their second dream-memory infiltration.
what do you say, captain?
hans truly considered it to be the appropriate course of action.
however, i shook my head.

name: bohgan
normalized: that can’t be allowed to happen.
in case that does happen, the old man of the neo-terras will be only one who will be pleased.

name: bohgan
normalized: even if the kushan armed forces are defeated, we don’t possess a powerful enough force to clean up this mess.

name: bohgan
normalized: mars will descend into further chaos, and that will only benefit the powerful neo-terras and new-solars.

name: hans
normalized: nevertheless, captain…
i raised my hand to shut hans’s mouth.

name: bohgan
normalized: complete the brainwashing of these pigs, so that we can take over the kushan armed forces and gain control of mars.

name: bohgan
normalized: we have to gain control of their infantry, in order to emerge victorious against the powerful neo-terras and new-solars.

name: hans
normalized: well then, shall i imprison them?
i shook my head again.

name: bohgan
normalized: be completely indifferent unless something out of the ordinary happens.
it will be my perfect victory, if i can understand what these intelligent pigs are up to.

name: bohgan
normalized: i know that you all are feeling anxious.
however, i have faith in the brainwashing and remodelling process, that you all have overseen so far.

name: bohgan
normalized: i have absolute trust in you all, so much so, that i am entrusting all our lives in your hands.
this is my request.
for the sake of our perfect victory!

name: subordinates
normalized: y-yes sir!
my men steeled themselves as well, after hearing my words.
and, that was that.
victory or death?
the goddess of destiny could go to hell.
if there was such a goddess, i would rape her.
if she was a witch, i would impregnate her.
this was how it had always been for me… this was the way of donny bohgan.
to believe in myself and push forward.
―― eight days until our arrival in libra.
